law.history: Repealed 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 45, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 201, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 246, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 7. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 63, sec. 21, effective June 15, 1950.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Suspension, revocation, or alteration of certificate or permit -- Notice to carrier of license holder's failure to appear -- Suspension for carrier's driver's failure to satisfy citation or summons.
